document_data.name: Sonnlinor
document_data.alignment2e: {{Alignment grid| on | off | off | on | off | off | off | off | off }}
document_data.mainbody: '''Sonnlinor''' were [[specialty priest]]s devoted to [[Moradin]], the Soul Forger.
document_data.Culture: The majority of sonnlinor were [[shield dwarves]] or [[gold dwarves]], but members of all of the [[dwarf]] races, both male and female, could become a sonnlinor.
document_data.Abilities:
Sonnlinor were often skilled blacksmiths, armorers, weaponsmiths, or masons.

In addition to their normal [[spell]]s, sonnlinor could cast ''[[animate weapon]]'', ''[[command]]'', ''[[strength of stone]]'', ''[[protection from paralysis]]'', ''[[spiritual hammer]]'', ''[[dispel magic]]'', ''[[stone shape]]'', ''[[Stonefire (spell)|stonefire]]'', ''[[flame strike]]'', ''[[defensive harmony]]'', and ''[[soul forge]]'' on a daily basis. Additionally, they could cast ''[[true seeing]]'' four times per day and ''[[elemental aura]]'' five times per tenday.
document_data.Possessions: Sonnlinor did not have restrictions on the type of weapon they were permitted to wield nor the [[armor]] they were allowed to wear. Most favored the [[warhammer]].
